miniapp.name: Boost - Yield Revolution
miniapp.subtitle: Earn 8-12% APY on stablecoins while supporting causes you care about
miniapp.description: Boost is a DeFi savings platform on Celo that makes yield generation accessible to everyone. Deposit cUSD or USDC to earn safe, sustainable yields through Aave V3, and optionally donate a portion of your earnings to vetted causes. Perfect for emerging markets seeking inflation protection.
miniapp.tagline: Grow your savings. Share your growth.
miniapp.ogDescription: Safe DeFi yields on Celo with optional donation features. Earn on cUSD & USDC through Aave V3.
